main event: A civilian student at Camp Poh-Tok, Maryland, observed a round object that appeared white when stationary and red when moving. The object increased in size with apparent motion and subsequent color change.
interesting points: The object was the size of a quarter when held at arm's length.
It was initially white when stationary and turned red when moving.
The object increased in size as it appeared to be in motion.
The report suggests that the object could have been a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object.
The sighting occurred during thunderstorms, affecting the atmospheric conditions.
